questions_and_notes: pr17O, prsn17O, sw17O, prw17O should probably all be evaluated consistently (all "where sea" or all for the entire grid cell).  And they should be consistent with the 18O variables
specific_issues: 8:Deprecate? Only 0 groups contributed this variable in CMIP6.
cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
long_name: Isotopic Ratio of Oxygen-17 in Sea Water
comment: Ratio of abundance of oxygen-17 (17O) atoms to oxygen-16 (16O) atoms in sea water
